The Brewhouse Show

Episode 00: Transparency

Pat Dryburgh wrote this on 03 Oct 2015
Tweet

One of our core values here at Brewhouse is “Test Everything”, so when Kalv and I began bandying about the idea of doing a podcast we knew we’d need to test it. And so, with as little fanfare and (hopefully) technical issues as possible, it is my pleasure to share with you Episode 00: Transparency (we couldn’t possibly do a pilot episode about transparency and not share it, could we?).

Show Notes

  • Inspiration Labs - VPL
  • The #AskGaryVee Show
  • The Recording Studio
  • Should your B2B company be as transparent as possible? by Mark Evans
  • Go Free Range
  • The Blog of The Artist Formerly Known as 37signals
  • 24Ways.org
  • alistapart.com
  • Promoting your product or service with banner ads – is it worth it? by Campaign Monitor
  • Trello
  • Tesla X
